com.tapsterrock.mpx
Class FileCreationRecord

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord
        |
        +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.FileCreationRecord
public class FileCreationRecord
extends com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord

This class represents the first record to appear in an MPX file. This record identifies the file type, version number, originating software and the separator to be used in the remainder of the file.

          Constant containing the record number associated with this record.

Field Detail

RECORD_NUMBER

public static final int RECORD_NUMBER
Constant containing the record number associated with this record. Note that in this case it is a dummy value, the actual value used in the file is MPX. The dummy value is used to allow all record types to be identified numerically.
